title: Installation issue: lz4
body:
Hello!

Trying to install one program, I've got stuck with the installation of lz4 package

Input: 
` spack install lz4 %gcc@7.3.0`

Output:
```
==> Warning: gcc@7.3.0 cannot build optimized binaries for "cascadelake". Using best target possible: "skylake_avx512"
==> Installing lz4-1.9.2-7qw3y3srox2ij2e6kcf34yxylkepq6oy
==> No binary for lz4-1.9.2-7qw3y3srox2ij2e6kcf34yxylkepq6oy found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /home/labuser/src/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/65/658ba6191fa44c92280d4aa2c271b0f4fbc0e34d249578dd05e50e76d0e5efcc.tar.gz
==> lz4: Executing phase: 'edit'
==> lz4: Executing phase: 'build'
==> lz4: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16' 'install' 'PREFIX=/home/labuser/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake_avx512/gcc-7.3.0/lz4-1.9.2-7qw3y3srox2ij2e6kcf34yxylkepq6oy'

1 error found in build log:
     15    /home/labuser/src/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -O3  -lrt -I../lib -DXXH_NAMESPACE=LZ4_  ../lib/lz4.o ../lib/lz4frame.o ../lib/lz4hc.o ../lib/xxhash.o bench.o dat
           agen.o lz4cli.o lz4io.o -o lz4
     16    make[1]: Leaving directory '/home/labuser/tsp_output/spack-stage/spack-stage-lz4-1.9.2-7qw3y3srox2ij2e6kcf34yxylkepq6oy/spack-src/programs'
     17    ==> lz4: Executing phase: 'install'
     18    ==> [2021-01-25-17:26:35.706898] 'make' '-j16' 'install' 'PREFIX=/home/labuser/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake_avx512/gcc-7.3.0/lz4-1.9.2-7qw3y3sr
           ox2ij2e6kcf34yxylkepq6oy'
     19    make[1]: Entering directory '/home/labuser/tsp_output/spack-stage/spack-stage-lz4-1.9.2-7qw3y3srox2ij2e6kcf34yxylkepq6oy/spack-src/lib'
     20    creating pkgconfig
  >> 21    make[1]: execvp: /usr/local: Permission denied
     22    make[1]: *** [Makefile:174: install] Error 127
     23    make[1]: Leaving directory '/home/labuser/tsp_output/spack-stage/spack-stage-lz4-1.9.2-7qw3y3srox2ij2e6kcf34yxylkepq6oy/spack-src/lib'
     24    make: *** [Makefile:94: install] Error 2
```
As I know, warning is not the cause of this issue, it's just informing me that cascadelake architecture is not supported by gcc@7.3.0.

All the best,
zimaaaaa
